text: Curtis DuBois Fuller (December 15, 1934 - May 8, 2021) was an American jazz trombonist. He was known as a member of Art Blakey's Jazz Messengers and worked with many classic jazz recordings.[ Allmusic] Fuller was a faculty member of the New York State Summer School of the Arts (NYSSSA) School of Jazz Studies (SJS).NYSSSA SJS Artistic Staff Fuller died on May 8, 2021 in New York City at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *WICN Worcester Jazz & Folk Radio Interview Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American composers Category:Educators from Detroit Category:American soul musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American trombonists Category:Musicians from Detroit
title: Curtis Fuller
